channel.title: firefox on OJ's Perspective
channel.description: Recent content in firefox on OJ's Perspective

item.title: Be Part of a World Record
item.description: Get yourself a copy of Firefox 3 on the day it’s released from this site and you’ll be doing your bit to get Firefox downloads in the world record books. Yup, you’ll also be falling for a huge marketing gag designed to get Firefox installed on as many machines as possible, but it’s a damned good browser anyway, so no harm done! :)
